ygData.subject: RE: Selo's and root
ygData.msgSnippet: If that happens again, use Mellifluous Motion;) ... From: Eric Boller [mailto:eboller@yahoo.com] Sent: Tuesday, November 16, 1999 9:12 AM To:
ygData.messageBody:
If that happens again, use Mellifluous Motion;)

-----Original Message-----
From: Eric Boller [mailto:eboller@...]
Sent: Tuesday, November 16, 1999 9:12 AM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: [eqbards] Selo's and root


From: Eric Boller <eboller@...>

Although Selo's does not break root anymore I thought
we had determined that it would on the next pulse if
you were playing it before being rooted. Well, last
night in Mistmoore this did not appear to be the case.
I was running around when I was rooted by
something--maybe dark offerer or whatever. Anyway
Selo's was on and did NOT break root. It is possible
that I got rooted and stunned which killed my song
before the next pulse. I got out of the root and was
blasted about 2 jumps from the zone. Arghhh. Anyway,
can anyone verify the root thing? I'll try to
experiment with a rooter tonight.

Thex Luteslinger (Tunare)

=====

with the subject submissions.
